channel.title: Posts on Apache Ratis
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Apache Ratis

item.title: Release 0.1.0-alpha is available
item.description: This is the first incubator release of Apache Ratis. Key features: Pluggable transports (Hadoop Rpc, GRpc, Netty) Pluggable statemachine Pluggable raft log implementation.
